import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem minkowski_fin {n : ℕ} (u v : Fin n → ℝ) (hu_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ u i) (hv_nonneg : ∀ i, 0 ≤ v i) (p : ℝ) (hp : 1 < p) :
  (∑ i : Fin n, ((u i + v i) ^ p)) ^ (1 / p) ≤ (∑ i : Fin n, (u i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) + (∑ i : Fin n, (v i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• Let n be a natural number. u and v are sequences of n nonnegative real numbers [tc_1].
• p is a real number such that p > 1 [tc_2].
Therefore, we conclude:
• ∑_{i=1}^n (u_i+v_i)^p = ∑_{i=1}^n u_i(u_i+v_i)^(p-1) + ∑_{i=1}^n v_i(u_i+v_i)^(p-1) [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
have l1 : (∑ i : Fin n, ((u i + v i) ^ p)) = (∑ i : Fin n, (u i * ((u i + v i) ^ (p - 1)))) + (∑ i : Fin n, (v i * ((u i + v i) ^ (p - 1)))) := by
  rw [← Finset.sum_add_distrib]
  apply Finset.sum_congr rfl
  intro i _
  have h_nonneg_u_add_v : 0 ≤ u i + v i := add_nonneg (hu_nonneg i) (hv_nonneg i)
  by_cases h_zero : u i + v i = 0
  · simp [h_zero]
    rw [Real.zero_rpow (ne_of_gt (lt_trans zero_lt_one hp))]
    suffices p - 1 ≠ 0 by simp [Real.zero_rpow this]
    linarith [hp]
  · have h_pos : 0 < u i + v i := Ne.lt_of_le' h_zero h_nonneg_u_add_v
    calc
      (u i + v i) ^ p = (u i + v i) * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        rw [← Real.rpow_one_add h_pos (p - 1)]
        field_simp
        ring
      _ = u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by rw [add_mul]
